body_html: Please let me know what else I can do to be helpful. This does not seem like it should be related to the platform because rnn.py is platform-independent; in addition, looking at the code the way it is on master confirms that this issue should happen (see my first comment for the code responsible).

body: Please let me know what else I can do to be helpful. This does not seem like it should be related to the platform because `rnn.py` is platform-independent; in addition, looking at the code the way it is on `master` confirms that this issue _should_ happen (see my first comment for the code responsible).
